dict.acceptation: 树枝；分支；部门，分科；支流；
分支形成；分支扩张；扩大某人的兴趣，业务或活动范围；[计]下分支的指令；
使分支；使分叉；用枝形叶脉刺绣花纹装饰；

sent.orig: The legislative branch enacts laws; the executive branch enforces them, and the judicial branch interprets them.
sent.trans: 立法部门制订法律，行政部门执行法律，司法部门解释法律。

sent.orig: Legislative branch makes the law. Executive branch enforce the law. Judicial ran branch ex-plains the law.
sent.trans: 立法部门制定法律，行政部门执行法律，司法部门解释法律。

sent.orig: The branch has long branch, short branch and fall off the cent of sexual rod.
sent.trans: 枝有长枝。短枝与脱落性小枝之分。

sent.orig: They are Legislative branch, Executive branch and Judicial branch.
sent.trans: 立法部门，行政部门和司法部门。

sent.orig: Our executive branch is not a committee of our legislative branch.
sent.trans: 我们的行政部门并不是立法部门的委员全。
